layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584 [bgcolor=#FFFFFF]
      LayoutBlockFlow (anonymous) at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 203x19
          text run at (0,0) width 203: "both tables should look identical"
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,20) size 50x48 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 48x46
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 48x42
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 44x42 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (11,11) size 22x19
                text run at (11,11) width 22: "cell"
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,68) size 50x48 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 48x46
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 48x42
